overview: It presents Nicole London in the lead, and wisely builds up her eagerness and lust as the movie progresses. She plays a "frigid" wife who's lady friends P.J. Nicole London may not be one of the most attractive ladies in porn, but her charisma and raw lust appearance make the screen light up.
title: Bare Market
